name: Divine Struggle
description:
Divine Struggle is a  game that focuses on the message “God brought life to earth by untangling the Chaos”, in which is inspired by the artwork “The Untangling of Chaos” by Hendrick Goltzius and influenced by the game Age of War. While the task of diminishing the darkness is already a struggle, guiding life to thrive is as challenging. As the Creator of Life, it has to ensure the evolution of lifeforms so that Darkness and Chaos can be vanquished slowly and surely.

How to unlock next Evolution :
  • Spawn the Four Elements in specific order to unlock new forces.
    • Eg. Spawn : Air -> Earth -> Water to unlock Bird Force
  • Unlock all the different forces to enter the next Evolution.

Questionnaire (Feedback after playing)

Current game build version : Alpha V1.0
